updates

⚇ ringtone workshop ( May 2025 ) ⚇

as the LCLO i ran a ringtone workshop, exploring their history, design and politics. all in aid of a new collaboration with artist Benji Jeffrey and the Peckham Chamber Orchestra.


⚇ MORE ROAR launch ( May 2025 ) ⚇

i played a synth and oboe duet with Agnes at the MORE ROAR launch party hosted by Avalon Cafe alongside some incredible artists. what a wonderful night!


⚇ bathrooms (study) ( Apr 2025 ) ⚇

Stage works in (and about) public bathrooms in response to the recent anti-trans UK Supreme Court ruling, statements made by the UK Government and the EHRC guidance.

See details here.
